item.description:
Being a spy is a harrowing job. Even moreso now that the top-secret documents have been stolen by an evil organization, and teams from four opposing intelligence agencies have been sent in to recover them. Players will join these teams, battling the agents of the evil organization and each other in this 2 hour energized foam sword event. Intended for ages 6 through adult.


Pre Reg: $15/members and friends $25/nonmembers
At Door: $25/members and friends $35/nonmembers

Waiver Required for all non-members
Contact Us to Pre-Register
item.name: Buddy Night: Espionage!
